TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ButtonColumnType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the button type for the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ButtonColumnType enumeration represents the button styles for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn> object.
